iconLabel.description: Sets the icon key work based on [Material Design icon list](https://pictogrammers.com/library/mdi/)

testId.description: ID used to locate the element in unit test suites

text.description: Sets the any text you want to show next to the icon

style.description: Custom styling applicable for specific cases

color.description: Color based on bulma's text color tokens

colorMode.description: Special usage in case you want to set as dark or light mode
